about_the_game:
The SFW DLC transforms all the sensual images and sounds in the game into sleek black screens and serene silence.
This addition is primarily designed for individuals who intend to create content for social media or platforms, streamlining the editing process significantly.

To remove this DLC and return to the original Tits and Shadows experience, right-click the game in your Steam library and choose "Properties." Next, navigate to the DLC section and unselect the SFW DLC. Close the window, and Steam should automatically uninstall this DLC from your computer.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult themes and content that may not be suitable for all ages. All characters with sex scenes in this title are 21 years of age and above!

Themes in this game include:

> Murder, abuse, cannibalism.

> Risqué outfits, sexual comments and lewd situations

> Full female, transgender and male nudity and sex

> Strong language and alcohol

> Dubious consent
